Welcome to My Playground

Caution - Passionate developer at play

What I Do

Trying out new things is a hobby of mine. I like to complete projects quickly, but I love to expand them to see what else can be done. Seeking to understand the incomprehensible is my passion. For me, learning was never confined to the classroom setting.

I am, at heart, a problem solver. I figure out perplexing issues and fix them with computers. Professionally, architecting Internet applications is what I focus on, but I tinker around in a lot of software development areas.
